title: Flying with Dad
story: Today we are flying, Richard. Are you sure it's safe, dad? Of course, son. I fly all the time. Can't we drive to grandma's house? Yes, we can, but it takes longer. Okay, dad. We'll fly. You are going to love it, son. I hope so.
summary: A young boy learns to overcome his fear of flying as he embarks on an adventure with his dad.
image: An airplane soaring through the sky with a child looking out the window in awe.
